body.name: Photon Surface & Air Purifier - Stops Mold Growth, Destroys Viruses & Bacteria, Reduces Lingering Odors 24/7 - Patented Ozone-free Ion Technology - P750 for Spaces Up To 750 Sq. Ft.
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Tuesday, February 20. Order within 17 hrs 14 mins
features: STOP MOLD GROWTH & REDUCE ODORS: Puraclenz Photon is over 99% effective at deactivating mold spores on exposed surfaces. Say goodbye to lingering odors caused by mold, mildew, and bacteria in even the darkest, hardest-to-reach nooks and crannies in your home.

DESTROY VIRUSES & BACTERIA: Our patented photocatalytic oxidation (PCO) technology is shown to be over 99% effective at destroying viruses and reducing dangerous bacteria mid-air. Intercept and neutralize pathogens present in the air and on exposed surfaces before they can reach you.

SAFE FOR PEOPLE, PETS, AND PLANTS: Puraclenz is certified ozone-free. Our patented purification technology evolved from the same science that provided clean air to astronauts in the International Space Station. Now in your space, effectively deactivate pollutants without any harm to loved ones.

CLEAN WHERE HEPA CAN’T REACH: Puraclenz Photon works by generating ions that travel throughout your space to proactively attack mold spores and pathogens mid-air and on surfaces where HEPA filters simply cannot reach, including walls and furniture. HEPA air purifiers work the opposite way by drawing in air and only filtering particles that reach the purifier. If you already own a high-quality HEPA filtration system, Photon will work alongside it to provide a complete home purification solution.

PLUG IT IN AND LET IT RUN: Experience 24/7 coverage in a powerful and compact air and surface purifier. With no bulky, expensive filters to replace and an energy-efficient compact design, Puraclenz Photon is easy to use and maintain. From bedrooms to conference halls, office spaces or classrooms, choose Photon to destroy pathogens in a specific area, or combine multiple devices for continuous coverage throughout any space.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 6, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars No proof that it's doing anything helpful, so I'm just trusting that the science is legit.
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. This produces a slight buzzing noise from the fan. The buzzing from my fridge is louder, so we don't really notice this slight noise unless we get up close and personal with the air purifier.I have left this thing running since the day we got it (2-3 months or so ago). I'll note that we haven't had a significant illness sweep through our house since we've had it, so I'll go ahead and use that to justify the price. Can you really put a price on your health?I discovered the Puraclenz when we were on vacation in St. Croix....the hotel room had one running and my husband noticed that I slept much better with the white noise this unit produced. I noted what it was, then came home to research and consequently, spent all of our kids' college funds on this small unit. "For the health of the family", I said!I liked that it touted the idea of sending ions out to kill mold spores. We haven't noticed any mold in our house, so that's good. Also, upon coming home from a week-long trip, the house smelled fantastic! I guess this was able to really clean the air while we were away.All in all, it's hard to know if it's just a gimmick or if it is actually helping improve our air quality (I don't have a fancy way to measure that!). My mental health is on the up and up - just by the thought of this thing keeping our house's air pure and clean. And for that, it's a peace of mind that I think was worth the cost.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 22, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Teeny Tiny! Size of Coffee Carafe. Basically did nothing, returned.
reviews.reviewText: I was shocked when I received this purifier. I bought it for my basement, which is just under 1,200 sq ft.This purifier is supposed to work for 1,500 sq ft but I'd be surprised if it could clean air in a closet, must less a room.I gave it a try for a week, plugged it in, the green light came on. I didn't detect any air movement at all.After a week I unplugged it, as this item doesn't have any switch for on off (what a joke).The filter was pure white as if never used. And I had this in my basement, which has plenty of dust.I returned this and thankfully got a refund.Currently I have these two types of room type purifiers -1. Holmes True HEPA Allergen Remover Mini Tower Air Purifier with Optional Ionizer( I don't use the ionizer because of Ozone). This purifier has a true HEPA filter, on off switch, 3 speed settings and is a work horse. It's not fancy, but it is dependable and affordable. I keep the one in bedroom on all the time. One for my office and one in living room. You can literally see a reduction in dust (I don't have to dust as often) and I breath so much easier!2. The PuroAir HEPA 14 Air Purifier for Pets - Covers 1,115 Sq Ft Also affordable!because of it's HEPA 14 filter. Have this in my (large) dining room area. I keep it on all the time.It has multiple switches, is attractive, and this room has much less dust in it now.It's still too soon for me to just this filter, after just a few weeks, but it seems to be doing a good job, does move air

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 25, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Wow! Surprisingly small, and shockingly effective
reviews.reviewText: Our house has pretty good airflow, but our partially finished basement has always had a musty smell, not mold from what tests show, but we have dogs that hang out down there, and it just smells like a basement I guess. I saw these advertised on Facebook and heard they were good from some friends who have one, so I decided to try it out. I was skeptical because it's so small, like really, really small. I got the middle size unit and put it in the finished part of the basement. Within two days, there was a notable reduction in the smell. I moved it into the unfinished area, which has more of a smell, but within a couple of days, that smell was gone.I'm shocked at how well this little thing works. I work from the finished basement area and while it was in there, I could hear it but it was quiet enough that it was barely noticeable. I have no doubt that it's working because the basement no longer smells. I just wish they had something that could be installed on my HVAC system :)I've used larger purifiers before, and they're usually large, loud, and I never felt like they worked. This one has got to use less electricity than those, it is pretty quiet as mentioned above (at least the middle size one is quiet), and its compact size makes it easy to move around and keep out of the way.It does come with a mounting plate, so you could hang it from a ceiling or wall....I don't think I'll use that, but I'm sure someone has a use case for it.If you're on the fence, get one of these, I'm sure you'll be happy with it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Seems to do as advertised
reviews.reviewText: I will say I was a bit skeptical. We live in a very wet climate. Musty smells and mold can be an issue. But it really seems to have helped. Musty smell is gone and no mold showing up.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars It Just Works!
reviews.reviewText: I purchased the mid-size unit P1500 and am pleased with its performance. I use it in conjunction with a number of HEPA filtration units which cover a considerably smaller area than the Puraclenz. They perform different functions.I am a smoker and this unit performs well in removing smoke particulates from the air. While Amazon's community guidelines do not permit health claims in reviews, the air in my home smells fresher and I am no longer the subject of complaint in our household.I encourage you to give it a try.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 22, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Poor life span
reviews.reviewText: After the initial order kept getting delayed via Amazon, it eventually never got delivered. I contacted Amazon and its was "lost" in shipment along with another model of the same I too ordered. Amazon then sent them out and 2-days ago they both arrived. I plugged it in and in less than a minute the green light turned red. I unplugged it, and it went green only to turn red again. It is not working when a red light displays. Very disappointed considering the cost and I have now purchased 3 of these product, the larger having the problem

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 20, 2023
reviews.reviewText: It’s aesthetically, pleasing, however, it doesn’t seem to make any difference in the air quality or odor. It is also a bit noisy.Cleaning the unit is simple, but after 3 months of use and no noticeable changes I just unplugged it.
